/* Page Banners */
.csu-infotainment-section .csu-slogan.about-home,
.csu-mini-infotainment-section .csu-slogan.course-name {
    background: #FFFFFF !important;
    box-shadow: 0.50em 0 0 #FFFFFF,-0.50em 0 0 #FFFFFF !important;
    color: #222222 !important;
    
}

.csu-infotainment-section .csu-sub-slogan.about-home,
.csu-mini-infotainment-section .csu-slogan.course-name span.smaller-banner {
    background: #FFFFFF !important;
    box-shadow: 0.50em 0 0 #FFFFFF,-18px 0 0 #FFFFFF !important;
    color: #222222 !important;
}

.logo-font.csu-slogan.about-home {
    padding: 0px 10px !important;
    position: relative;
    bottom: -1px !important;
}

.csu-banner-text-section .responsive, .csu-banner-text-section {
    visibility: visible !important;
}
/* End Page Banners */

p.testimonial-text, p.testimonial-text::before, p.testimonial-text::after, .testimonial-author-info, .content-banner-type1 .custom .banner-content.csu-white a.button.hero-button {color:#e9ceca !important;}
.testimonial-author-info .author-name, .testimonial-author-info .author-org, .testimonial-author-info .author-info {color:#e9ceca !important;}

.alt .testimonial-text p:first-of-type::before,
.alt .testimonial-text p:last-of-type::after {
    color: #e9ceca;
    opacity: 0.2;
}
.testimonial-author-info .author-name strong {
    color: #fff !important;
}
.author-org {
    color: #fff !important;
}

section.csu-more-section.page-introduction div.container {
    margin-left: 0 !important;
    margin-right: 0 !important;
}

.coursesButtons .calp-box {
    background-color: transparent;
    border-radius: 0;
    box-shadow: none !important;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: left;
    align-items: center;
    position: relative;
    color: #222222;
}

.coursesButtons .calp-box:hover, 
.coursesButtons .calp-box:focus {
    color: #222222;
    background-color: #ffffff;
    transform: unset !important;
    box-shadow: unset !important;
}

/* this class is injected using Jquery and only applies to IE 
div#courses-search.ie-centre { left: 50% !important; }*/

div#courses-search.container div#filterArea div.row div.col.s12.m12.l12.center div.row {padding-top: 10px !important;}

div#filterArea &gt; div.row &gt; div.col &gt; div.row &gt; a:last-child .coursesButtons .calp-box:hover, 
div#filterArea &gt; div.row &gt; div.col &gt; div.row &gt; a:last-child .coursesButtons .calp-box:focus {
    background-color: transparent;
}

div#filterArea {
    background-color: #EEE9E2;
    position: absolute !important;
    margin-top: 20px;
}

div#filterArea &gt; div.row {
    padding-top: 0 !important;
}

@media only screen and (min-width: 993px) {
    div.cohort-buttons-row div.cohort-button {
        width: 20% !important;
    }

    div#filterArea &gt; div.row {
        width: 70%;
    }
}
